entry.title: Wednesday night: Wet flurries at times heavy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Wet flurries at times heavy ending early this evening then partly cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 early this evening then becoming light late this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:31 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
